genresAdvancedInfo.name: zurich indie
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Zurich indie is a genre of music that originated in the city of Zurich, Switzerland. It is characterized by its experimental sound, which often incorporates elements of electronic music, rock, and folk. Zurich indie bands often have a DIY ethos and are known for their unique and innovative approach to music. The genre has gained popularity in recent years, with many Zurich indie bands gaining international recognition.

index.head-title: Spotify Top artists and songs - Stats about your music on Spotify
